line_1: The Title Knave shou'd prove a Blot;
Thou human brute! whose very name's a blot.
line_2: Shame on the wretch, who dealt the deadly draught!

line_2: Tho' long forgiv'n, tho' long forgot;

line_1: Asham'd, she marks that passage with a blot,
line_2: And hates the line where Candour was forgot.

Oh avarice! were thy deeds forgot,

line_1: And keep your 'scutcheon free frae blot.
line_2: Upon you in your humble cot,

line_1: The very butt of slander, and the blot
line_2: For ev'ry dart that malice ever shot.
